story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_0100_10: So, the stones were also found in town?
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_0200_10:
Oui! As we thought, they’re similar to sync stones,
but have key differences.
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_0300_10:
Erm... Come to think of it, where ARE sync stones
found?
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_0400_10: Yeah! I’d like to know, too!
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_0500_10:
I’ve been using one ever since I came to Pasio
without really thinking about it much, but I don’t
exactly know what kind of stones they are.
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_0700_10:
As a sync stone researcher, I can give a brief
explanation.
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_0800_10:
Sync stones are mysterious rainbow-colored
minerals that are mined from deposits in the
seabed around Pasio.
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_0900_10:
That’s the reason why Lear decided to create an
artificial island here.
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_1000_10:
Lumps of sync stones can be found deep
underground...
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_1100_10:
but countless pieces rise to the ocean’s surface
due to natural causes, such as plate tectonics and
the movement of celestial bodies.
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_1200_10:
At night, the pieces floating on the ocean make it
look like a starlit sky—it’s very romantic!
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_1400_10:
As you know, sync stones are pretty, but they also
contain powerful energy.
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_1500_10:
They release that energy in reaction to the bond
between a Pokémon and its Trainer...and they can
cause chaos if they’re used the wrong way.
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_1600_10:
Yeah... They can strengthen your bond, but they
can also tear you apart from your Pokémon...
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_1700_10:
However, sync stones cannot release energy unless
they’ve been specially processed.
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_1800_10:
That’s why they’re embedded in everyone’s
Poryphone.
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_1900_10:
Handling a sync stone in its raw state is not
dangerous. However...
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_2000_10:
We don’t know if that’s true of these mysterious
stones, even though they have similar properties as
sync stones, right?
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_2200_10:
I see... If sync stones are normally found in
the ocean...
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_2300_10:
then the stones we’re finding in town must
be different.
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_2400_10:
It’s also strange that we’ve only been discovering
them recently, even though people explore Pasio
every day.
story_stone_02_02000/2401_1201_2600_10:
(Giovanni tried to take over Pasio, and a
space-time rift appeared...)
